name: Indie-Life Media
tagline: Obsessed with nurturing your independent spirit.
description:
Indie-Life is a full-service events and creative agency specializing in brand strategy and media production. Possibly even more so than money, we believe a powerful network can make all the difference. To this end, Indie-Life has built a continuously growing ecosystem of over 200 talented local creative and production professionals to handle every aspect of our clients’ marketing, events or small business needs.
We know it can be difficult for business owners to work on their business, as well as in them. Small businesses should have access to the resources they need without having to piecemeal their efforts. So we do more than make matches: We manage the project through to completion, ensuring quality and continuity from start to finish.
READ MORE...
